new_rules.name: cpp_files01_different_directory_inside_scancode_json_rules_file
new_rules.test: all(extension == resource.extension for extension in ['.cpp']) & any(file_type == resource.file_type for file_type in ['C source, ASCII text', 'C++ source, ASCII text', 'ASCII text'])

new_rules.name: cpp_files_c_extension01_different_directory_inside_scancode_json_rules_file
new_rules.test: all(extension == resource.extension for extension in ['.c']) & any(file_type == resource.file_type for file_type in ['C source, ASCII text']) & all(programming_language == resource.programming_language for programming_language in ['C++'])

new_rules.name: cpp_files_header01_different_directory_inside_scancode_json_rules_file
new_rules.test: all(extension == resource.extension for extension in ['.h']) & any(file_type == resource.file_type for file_type in ['ASCII text', 'C++ source, ASCII text', 'C source, ASCII text'])

new_rules.name: map_files01_different_directory_inside_scancode_json_rules_file
new_rules.test: all(extension == resource.extension for extension in ['.map']) & any(file_type == resource.file_type for file_type in ['ASCII text'])

new_rules.name: Blueprint_files01_different_directory_inside_scancode_json_rules_file
new_rules.test: all(extension == resource.extension for extension in ['.bp']) & any(file_type == resource.file_type for file_type in ['ASCII text'])
